com.facebook.react.views.viewpager

Class ReactViewPager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewPager
      • com.facebook.react.views.viewpager.ReactViewPager

  • public class ReactViewPager
extends ViewPager
    Wrapper view for ViewPager. It's forwarding calls to ViewGroup.addView(android.view.View) to add views to custom PagerAdapter instance which is used by NativeViewHierarchyManager to add children nodes according to react views hierarchy.
